title: Berkshire Hathaway Reports Third-Quarter Loss
description: The company’s huge investment portfolio lost money, while its insurance arm felt the effects of Hurricane Ian and inflation-driven rises in property and damage claims.
dc:creator: Michael J. de la Merced
media:description: Warren Buffett, the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, earlier this year. The company’s third-quarter earnings highlighted how much it is a microcosm of the American economy.
